catalog_info.title: Loitering: Studio Course
catalog_info.notes:
Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure. Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure.
No previous studio experience necessary.
catalog_info.description: You will hang out in the vicinity of culture and make things in response to it. This class is not thematic or linked to any particular discipline.
